name: Pokini Beach
description:
I am making a game about cute girls having fun at the beach. This is a prototype to test the core movement mechanics. You can use your keyboard or gamepad to play skeeball by smacking the ball around.

  • MOVE = WASD or Gamepad Left/Right stick
  • JUMP = Space or Gamepad Left/Right trigger
  • DASH = Left Shift or Gamepad Left/Right shoulder

Throw yourself into the ball to automatically hit it. If you time your hit well you will see a hitspark and time will briefly pause. You can aim the ball by moving during this paused time.

Stand still and hold down DASH to emote; this doesn't do anything except look cute.
